content.rendered:
Client

STYLECABLE is an e-commerce web platform that connects the most talented up-and-coming fashion designers with their fans and customers.

Objective

Develop product technical roadmap, educate the client on existing e-commerce solutions, build the platform and support it during the entire system lifecycle.

Solution

Achievion team built the STYLECABLE website on the popular Broadleaf E-commerce engine. It did all the heavy lifting of order processing and account management saving money for the client along the way. Achievion developers created a sleek looking frontend, integrated it with the backend and finally deployed the system in to the AWS cloud.

Major platform features include:

  • Discover latest fashion trends
  • Follow designers
  • Purchase or pre-order designer pieces

Result

The platform not only met the client objective but its innovative design led to being featured in the Washington Post’s fashion section many times.

excerpt.rendered: STYLECABLE is an e-commerce web platform that connects the most talented up-and-coming fashion designers with their fans and customers.
